name: Fimbulvetr (Feyrex)
description:
Viking finds himself on a foreign land surrounded by Cthulhu's minions. He hears the great old ones call, but his willpower does not allow him to fall to it. 

Kill enemies to get gold, spend gold to buy ammo and weapons.
Execute enemies with your axe to gain fury. Fury can be used for skills  to deal massive damage or push enemies away from yourself.

Every time you go to a new level the enemies spawn faster, making it harder to survive. How long can you last?

Installation:
Unpack the files to your computer and run the .exe file.

Controls:
WASD movement
Shoot weapons: Mouse 1
Melee weapon: Mouse 2
Shoot weapon selections: Numbers 1-5
Thunder skill: Q
Spirit skill: E

**Note: Game does not have sound.

Credits:

Lauri Ojanperä, Programmer
